title: Speaker for Phone/Whatsapp/Alarm doesn't work, but Media does?
content:
I noticed this issue yesterday when I was on a WhatsApp video call and the sound just cut off halfway. I thought it was a network issue. This morning, I also noticed no sound coming from my alarm. Finally, the speakers aren't working when I put someone on speaker using the Phone app. 

Yet I can play the media sound on Spotify/YouTube with no problem? I triple checked and all my volume are maxed out.

I've already hard reset my device and cleared cache. Any other ideas?
